tool_description: Monitors vendor proposal submissions, tracks deadlines, and manages the proposal receipt process.

expected_vendors.description: List of vendors expected to submit proposals

error_messages: Invalid RFP ID: Provide valid RFP document identifier.
Invalid deadline: Submission deadline must be in ISO 8601 format.
Empty vendor list: At least one expected vendor must be specified.
Invalid submission methods: Use email, portal, or physical submission methods.
usage: Provide RFP ID, submission deadline, expected vendor list, and accepted submission methods. The tool tracks proposal receipts and provides status updates throughout the submission period.

received_proposals.description: List of proposals received with timestamps

pending_vendors.description: Vendors who have not yet submitted proposals

submission_summary.description: Summary of submission status and statistics
